### üü¢ Study area


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
cp <- st_read("resources/cp_2.shp",quiet = T)
box <- st_read("resources/box.gpkg",quiet = T)

factorPal <- colorFactor(
  c('#2e4eb0'), "Study area")

leaflet() %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>% 
  addPolygons(
    data = box,
    weight = 2,
    fill = NA,
    color = "#2e4eb0",
    opacity = 1) %>% 
  addPolygons(
    data = box,
    weight = 1,
    fillColor = "#2e4eb0",
    fillOpacity = 0,
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      style = list("font-weight" = "normal", padding = "3px 8px"),
      textsize = "15px",
      direction = "auto")) %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(
    data = cp,
    radius = 1,
    stroke = 1) %>% 
  addLegendFactor(
    pal = factorPal,
    shape = 'rect',
    fillOpacity = 1,
    opacity = 0,
    values = "Boundary", 
    title = 'Legend',
    position = 'bottomright',
    data = box,
    group = 'Polygons')

```


### üü¢ Communities
